description: Number of hexagonal n-element polyominoes whose graph is a path.
comments: In other words, number of 2-sided strip polyhexes with n cells.
references: E. M. Palmer, Variations of the cell growth problem, Lect. Notes Math. 303 (1972), 215-224.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
